name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A young man played "Glory to Hong Kong" in a shopping mall in the country to show his support for the young people who are currently being illegally detained in special training schools.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen posted on a social platform that Taiyuan Preschool Teachers College made public the admission of the second batch of professional doctoral students in 2024, but the final result of the announcement caused a lot of controversy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Nanjing, Jiangsu, the incident of "a camera was found in the restroom of the library of Hohai University" has attracted attention. On September 23, a reporter from Dahe Daily contacted multiple departments of the university to learn about the relevant situation. A staff member of the Security Department of Hohai University said that it was "inconvenient to answer"; a teacher from the Party and Government Office of the university said that the relevant issues were the responsibility of the school's Propaganda Department. Afterwards, the reporter asked the Propaganda Department of the Party Committee of the university, "Have you reported this to the police?", but the other party asked back, "Why report this to the police?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The "milk ordering incident" reappears: "Students are prohibited from bringing their own milk to school, but are allowed to drink milk provided by the school. What's the logic behind this?" According to reports, on September 23, a netizen posted a video saying that the practice of a school in Dezhou, Shandong was "difficult to understand", which aroused concern.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, Xiuxiang Avenue in Nanning, Guangxi. A group of images of suspected septic tank pipeline explosions went viral on the Internet. According to the video footage from multiple angles, a cloud of yellow smoke spewed out from the road and then fell on the windows of a moving car, instantly blocking the view. An excavator was working at the explosion point, and there was a fence next to it. The staff of the Nanning Emergency Management Bureau responded that it was a sewage pipe explosion and was being repaired. No vehicles were damaged and no one was injured.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 23, in Nanjing, Jiangsu, a large number of 100-yuan bills suddenly appeared on the road, and passing car owners stopped and quickly joined the team picking up the bills.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, in Dezhou, Shandong, parents and teachers protested outside the school because they were dissatisfied with the independence of Dezhou No. 1 Middle School (East Campus) as Dezhou Xincheng Middle School.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, China's Ministry of Commerce said it was investigating PVH Corp., the owner of clothing brands Calvin Klein and Tommy Hilfiger. The investigation will determine whether PVH will be included in the "unreliable entity list" for allegedly boycotting Xinjiang cotton products. Being blacklisted will prohibit the company from selling products to or purchasing products from China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, the Wall Street Journal reported that Zhu Hengpeng, former deputy director of the Institute of Economics of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, was under investigation, detained and removed from his post. He was reportedly critical of Xi Jinping's management of the domestic economy in a private chat group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added some inside information about hidden cameras in hotel and B&B rooms:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 24, Wang Yi stated at the UN Security Council that any attempt to smear China on the Russia-Ukraine issue will not succeed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 23, Wang Yi met with the Lebanese Foreign Minister and said that no matter how the situation changes, China will continue to stand on the side of justice and on the side of Arab brothers including Lebanon.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After experiencing several rounds of reversals, will the mental state of the little pinks change?
